text: ai logon tumhaare paas tumhaare paravaradigaar kee taraf se rasool (mohammad) deene haq ke saath aa chuke hain eemaan lao (yahee) tumhaare haq mein behatar hai aur agar inkaar karoge to (samajh rakho ki) jo kuchh zameen aur aasamaanon mein hai sab khuda hee ka hai aur khuda bada vaaqifakaar hakeem hai
